sentences.en: And he pinched me the third time with the same air of cleverness.
sentences.cn: 说到这里,他又像刚才那样第三次意味深长地拧了我一下.

sentences.en: Between cleverness and wisdom, I prefer the latter.
sentences.cn: 在聪明与智慧之间我更喜欢后者。

sentences.en: But that brings us back to the excessive cleverness (and opacity) that we hope to avoid.
sentences.cn: 但是这又让我们回到了希望避免的聪明过度（和不透明性）上。

sentences.en: Excessive cleverness rarely pays in diplomacy.
sentences.cn: 聪明过顶在外交中是很少不吃亏的.

sentences.en: He never boasted of his cleverness.
sentences.cn: 他未曾夸耀过自己的聪明.

sentences.en: He sat back, smiling complacently at his own cleverness.
sentences.cn: 他身子往后一靠，为自己的聪明得意地笑了。

sentences.en: Her cleverness and talent helped her look more beautiful than ever.
sentences.cn: 她的聪明才智使她更显得美貌非凡。

sentences.en: His cleverness and skill compel our admiration.
sentences.cn: 他的聪明和技艺博得我们的赞赏.

sentences.en: I'm too big a fool to swallow your cleverness.
sentences.cn: 我太愚笨了,理解不了你的聪明才智.

sentences.en: Impossible as it was, he could not help smiling at its cleverness.
sentences.cn: 尽管这事情看来不太可能, 他禁不住为自己问话的巧妙而喜容满面.

sentences.en: In basketball, his speed and cleverness were an offset to his small size.
sentences.cn: 打篮球时, 他的速度和机智弥补了他身材矮小的不足.

sentences.en: It is a way to trip our own cleverness.
sentences.cn: 这是一种给我们自己的聪明才智设置条条框框的做法.

sentences.en: Sagacity, unlike cleverness, usually increases with age.
sentences.cn: 明智和聪明不同, 通常是随着年龄增长的.

sentences.en: She gazed up at him, blinking once or twice, apparently surprised at his cleverness.
sentences.cn: 她抬头注视着他，偶尔才眨一下眼睛，显然对他的聪明才智颇为惊讶。

sentences.en: The fox is known for its cleverness and cunning.
sentences.cn: 狐狸的机敏和狡猾是人所共知的.

sentences.en: The people who worked for her all admired her cleverness and courage.
sentences.cn: 在她手下工作的人都很佩服她的机智和勇气.

sentences.en: Your cleverness and skill has compelled our admiration.
sentences.cn: 你的聪明和技巧使我们不得不敬佩.
